flawed_nl_solution:
Sonja will spend $3 + $23 = $<<3+23=26>>26.
Barbara will spend 5 + ( 2 * 2) = $<<5+2*2=9>>9.
Mario and Rick will spend 2 * 3 = $<<2*3=6>>6.
Everyone but Sonijs spend $9 + $6 + $4 = $<<9+6+4=23>>23.
Sonija spent $26 - $23 = $<<26-23=3>>3 more than the rest of the people at the party.
